title: Enhancing Online Mathematics Education Training Effectiveness Through Active Learning

context.additional_context: Self-directed learning competency strengthening through mathematics problem-solving and project execution in VR-based simulation environments

learning_goals: Learners can solve 3D spatial geometry problems in VR simulation environments with over 80% accuracy.
Learners can perform real-world mathematical modeling through collaborative projects and produce presentation materials based on the results.
Learners can consistently engage in critical thinking activities, including peer assessments, on online discussion boards at least twice a week.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
